_source.text: A call is like a Vote, better than a petition!!! Big Corps like Monsanto are more powerful than presidents worldwide if the Trans pacific partnership (TPP) goes through!!! PLEASE PAY ATTENTION TO THIS NOW.

text: A call is like a Vote, **better** **than** a **petition**!!! Big Corps like Monsanto are more powerful than
presidents worldwide if the Trans pacific partnership (TPP) **goes** through!!! PLEASE PAY ATTENTION TO THIS NOW.
